apis.description: Prints the formatted representation of *object*, followed by a newline.
apis.name: pprint.pp
apis.signature: pp(object, stream=None, indent=1, width=80, depth=None, *, compact=False, sort_dicts=False, underscore_numbers=False)

apis.description: Prints the formatted representation of *object*, followed by a newline.
apis.name: pprint.pprint
apis.signature: pprint(object, stream=None, indent=1, width=80, depth=None, *, compact=False, sort_dicts=True, underscore_numbers=False)

apis.description: Return the formatted representation of *object* as a string.
apis.name: pprint.pformat
apis.signature: pformat(object, indent=1, width=80, depth=None, *, compact=False, sort_dicts=True, underscore_numbers=False)

apis.description: Determine if the formatted representation of *object* is "readable", or can be used to reconstruct the value using "eval()".
apis.name: pprint.isreadable

apis.description: Determine if *object* requires a recursive representation.
apis.name: pprint.isrecursive

apis.description: Return a string representation of *object*, protected against recursion in some common data structures.
apis.name: pprint.saferepr
pprint.PrettyPrinter
apis.signature: PrettyPrinter(indent=1, width=80, depth=None, stream=None, *, compact=False, sort_dicts=True, underscore_numbers=False)

apis.description: Print the formatted representation of *object* on the configured stream, followed by a newline.
apis.name: pprint.PrettyPrinter.pprint

apis.description: Determine if the formatted representation of the object is "readable", or can be used to reconstruct the value using "eval()".
apis.name: pprint.PrettyPrinter.isreadable

apis.description: Determine if the object requires a recursive representation.
apis.name: pprint.PrettyPrinter.isrecursive

apis.description: Returns three values: the formatted version of *object* as a string, a flag indicating whether the result is readable, and a flag indicating whether recursion was detected.
apis.name: pprint.PrettyPrinter.format
